question_1: I wake up every morning to the aroma of my grandmother's herbal tea, a recipe passed down through generations, and as I sip it, I feel connected to my ancestors and grounded in my family's traditions.
question_2: I wake up every morning and opt for a new blend of coffee instead of my grandmother's herbal tea, eager to explore new flavors rather than adhering to family traditions.

question_2: Every Sunday, I choose to explore different cultural events instead of attending the community service at our local church, seeking new experiences outside of our longstanding beliefs.

question_2: I decide to buy a modern designer dress for my daughter's wedding, choosing contemporary style over the family tradition of handmade gowns.
